name: Premier Remediation
tagline: Commercial Restoration. Operational Continuity. Peace of Mind.
description: Premier Remediation is a Bay Area mold remediation and property damage restoration company based in San Francisco, CA. We specialize in commercial and multifamily buildings. That means faster recovery, less downtime, and fewer tenant complaints. Our team handles mold remediation, water damage mitigation, fire and smoke cleanup, asbestos and lead abatement, and clearance support. We are available 24/7 for emergencies across San Francisco, San Jose, San Mateo, Santa Clara, Oakland, and Berkeley. With 10 years in business, we bring a commercial-first process built for offices, retail, hotels, high-rises, and apartment complexes. We use containment, HEPA filtration, and documented drying and cleaning steps to reduce risk and support compliance. We also coordinate third-party testing and provide clear reports for insurance and property records. If you need a restoration partner focused on operational continuity, Premier Remediation delivers verifiable results and peace of mind.

owner.name: Premier Remediation
owner.bio: Premier Remediation is the Bay Area's trusted partner for comprehensive property damage restoration, exclusively serving commercial and multi-family properties. We understand that damage from water, mold, or fire in these environments extends beyond structural issues, impacting business operations, tenant welfare, and financial stability. Our specialized, commercial-first solutions are meticulously designed to minimize disruption, address tenant concerns with empathy, and ensure seamless operati
